SELECT tuf.date1 times, tuf.num1 currentreg, user_new.num_new newuser, user_invest.num1 investuser, user_borrow.num2 borrowuser, user_login.num2 loginuser, user_pc.numpc pcreguser, userapp.numapp appreguser FROM
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) date1, count(*) num1 FROM t_user tu GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) tuf
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) date_new, count(*) num_new FROM t_user tu GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) user_new ON tuf.date1=user_new.date_new
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) date1, count(*) num1 FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.userType=2 GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) user_invest ON tuf.date1=user_invest.date1
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) date2, COUNT(*) num2 FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.userType=1 GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) user_borrow ON tuf.date1=user_borrow.date2
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) date2, count(*) num2 FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.isLoginLimit=0 GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) user_login ON tuf.date1=user_login.date2
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) datepc, count(*) numpc FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.regSource='web01' OR tu.regSource='web02' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) user_pc ON tuf.date1=user_pc.datepc
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10) dateapp, count(*) numapp FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.regSource='iosApp01' OR tu.regSource='iosApp02' OR tu.regSource='androidApp01' OR tu.regSource='androidApp02' OR tu.regSource='weixin01' OR tu.regSource='weixin02' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tu.regDate, 1, 10)) userapp ON tuf.date1=userapp.dateapp
and tuf.date1 between #{beginTimes} and #{endTimes}

SELECT fu.date_fu times, fu.sum_fu withdrawamount, 20000000.00 alreadyload, 1500000.00 pendingload, fu.count_fu withdrawnum, fpc.pc pcwithdraw, fapp.app appwithdraw FROM
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_fu,SUM(f.amount) sum_fu,COUNT(f.userId) count_fu FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='3' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fu
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_pc,SUM(f.amount) pc FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='3' AND f.source='pc' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fpc ON fu.date_fu=fpc.date_pc
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10) date_app,SUM(f.amount) app FROM t_fd_user_fund f WHERE f.rechargeType='3' AND f.source='app' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(f.createDate, 1, 10)) fapp ON fu.date_fu=fapp.date_app
and times between #{beginTimes} and #{endTimes}
